name: part_006
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】遅れたけど、誕生日3Dライブやります！ ⧸  BIRTHDAY 3D LIVE！【#戌神ころね生誕祭2022】 [Zvb8xKmP-9U]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Inugami Korone performs 'Hajimete Shimasho' with a 3D Koronesuki on stage.
MC section where Korone talks about Koronesuki's 3D debut and takes photos with the mascot.

subtitles.original: ねぇ　どうしてあなた　いきなり　逃げ出しちゃうのね
subtitles.english: Hey, why do you suddenly run away?

subtitles.original: 私に振り向いてよ　夢の中だもん
subtitles.english: Turn toward me, it's just a dream

subtitles.original: 一緒にいるのに　なぜなぜ　あなたは私を見ないの
subtitles.english: Even though we're together, why don't you look at me?

subtitles.original: こんなにこんなに好きでも　願いは叶わないのね
subtitles.english: No matter how much I love you, my wish won't come true

subtitles.original: 嫌い　嫌い　嫌い　本当だよ
subtitles.english: I hate you, I hate you, I hate you, it's true

subtitles.original: 嫌い　嫌い　嫌い　本当だもん
subtitles.english: I hate you, I hate you, I hate you, really

subtitles.original: 嫌い　嫌い　嫌い　嫌い　だい嫌い
subtitles.english: I hate you, I hate you, I hate you, I really hate you

subtitles.original: ねぇ　大好きだよって本当は　囁きたいのね
subtitles.english: Hey, I actually want to whisper "I love you"

subtitles.original: いつの日か私たち　結ばれるのよね
subtitles.english: Someday we will be together, right?

subtitles.original: 一緒にいられて幸せ　叱られちゃうのも好き好き
subtitles.english: I'm happy to be with you, I even like being scolded

subtitles.original: 笑顔がないのも素敵よ　私の願いを叶えて
subtitles.english: Even when you're not smiling, it's wonderful

subtitles.original: しましょ　しましょ　しましょ　ハホッ
subtitles.english: Let's do it, let's do it, let's do it, hah-hoh

subtitles.original: しましょ　しましょ　しましょ　ハホッ
subtitles.english: Let's do it, let's do it, let's do it, hah-hoh

subtitles.original: しましょ　しましょ　しましょ　しましょ　はじめてしましょ
subtitles.english: Let's do it, let's do it, let's do it, let's start for the first time

subtitles.original: はい、ということで、マツケンサンバⅡと「はじめてしましょ」聴いてもらいましたけれども
subtitles.english: Yes, so, we've just heard "Matsuken Samba II" and "Hajimete Shimasho"

subtitles.original: ね、あの、ころねすきーがなんとついに3Dの体を手に入れました！
subtitles.english: And, well, Koronesuki has finally gotten a 3D body!

subtitles.original: あのね、前のだいぶ前の歌枠で、なんかマツケンサンバ一緒に3Dで歌おうねみたいに約束したの覚えてる？みんな
subtitles.english: You know, in a singing stream a long time ago, I promised we'd sing "Matsuken Samba" together in 3D. Do you guys remember?

subtitles.original: それがね、今日なんと、約束が果たせました。楽しかった？
subtitles.english: And today, that promise has been fulfilled. Did you have fun?

subtitles.original: あ、楽しかったみたいだよ。せっかく、だからちょっとね、撮影しようか？ちょっとみんなで
subtitles.english: Ah, it looks like he had fun. Since we're here, why don't we take some photos together?

subtitles.original: あ、ちょっとそっち向いてるんだよね、みんなね。
subtitles.english: Ah, everyone's looking that way, right?

subtitles.original: そしたらじゃあ、まずじゃあ、ピースする？ピース。
subtitles.english: In that case, first, shall we do a peace sign? Peace.

subtitles.original: 顔がでかいな、ちょっと本人がちょっと前出たほうがいい。
subtitles.english: His face is huge, it's better if he stands a bit further forward.

subtitles.original: あ、撮れた？みんな。撮れたー？
subtitles.english: Ah, did you get it? Everyone. Did you get it?

subtitles.original: じゃあ、ちょっと抱きしめてもらおうかな？
subtitles.english: Then, maybe I'll have him give me a hug?

subtitles.original: じゃあ、ころねすきーに抱きしめてもらいます。
subtitles.english: Alright, I'll have Koronesuki hug me.

subtitles.original: ちょっとやっぱ怪物みたいだね、ころねすきーね、ちょっとね。
subtitles.english: He really does look a bit like a monster, Koronesuki, doesn't he?

subtitles.original: ということで、えっと、次の曲もありますので、このころねすきーにはね、やっぱ前で見てもらおうかな。
subtitles.english: Anyway, um, there's another song, so I'll have this Koronesuki watch from the front.

subtitles.original: はい、ありがとうね。一緒に踊ってくれて。ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Okay, thank you. For dancing with me. Thank you!

subtitles.original: ということで、ころねすきーと一緒に歌った2曲でした。次の曲
subtitles.english: So, those were the two songs I sang with Koronesuki. The next song...

subtitles.original: 聞いてください。このまま行きます。
subtitles.english: Please listen. I'll go straight into it.

subtitles.original: このまま　歩き続けてる
subtitles.english: Continuing to walk like this

subtitles.original: 今夜も明日も　1人の足跡
subtitles.english: Tonight and tomorrow too, a solitary footprint

subtitles.original: 辿って　果てしない　だけど君だけは
subtitles.english: Tracing it, it's endless, but only you

subtitles.original: どこかで待ってる　笑顔絶やさずに
subtitles.english: Are waiting somewhere, without losing your smile

subtitles.original: Believe...
subtitles.english: Believe...

subtitles.original: Be the one, be the one, Alright!
subtitles.english: Be the one, be the one, Alright!

subtitles.original: 明日の地球を　投げ出せないから
subtitles.english: Because I can't give up on tomorrow's Earth

subtitles.original: Be the light, be the light, Alright!
subtitles.english: Be the light, be the light, Alright!

subtitles.original: 強くなれるよ　愛は負けない
subtitles.english: I can become stronger, love won't lose

subtitles.original: 何かを助け　救って抱きしめ
subtitles.english: Helping something, saving and embracing

subtitles.original: 心に触れて　届くよ伝われ
subtitles.english: Touching the heart, reaching out, let it be conveyed

subtitles.original: Be the one, be the light, メッセージ送るよ
subtitles.english: Be the one, be the light, I'll send a message

subtitles.original: 響くよ
subtitles.english: It will resonate

subtitles.original: 何より　大事な出来事
subtitles.english: More than anything, an important event

subtitles.original: 生きてる今夜も　必ず前に
subtitles.english: Living tonight too, definitely forward

subtitles.original: 進まなきゃいけない
subtitles.english: I have to move forward

subtitles.original: 昨日より　強さと優しさ
subtitles.english: More than yesterday, strength and kindness

subtitles.original: 大人になってる
subtitles.english: I'm becoming an adult
